State.id: J2SDK5.0 specific issues and migration aids

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE

MESSAGE.value:
Added basic type inference for integer literals:
+ i = 0
Defines a integer
Renamed "attributes" for "variables" in state classes.
Renamed some specs to be more meaningful

Infer from literals. Added, boolean, String, Date, and Regexp literals.
Renemed the clas InferFromPrimitivesSpec.ryz to
Using ISO 8601format for date literals ( yyyy-MM-dd ) instead of dd-MM-yyyy
Added state to BehaviorAssertionStrategy. Now, an object being tested in the "behavior" entry, preserves the state between invocations in to be able to see the side effects.
Refactored the AttributeTransformer class to avoid having all those if/else chains

Removed ^ character. Is no longer needed because we know how to return a value.
It will be added for premature return and/or return from closure
Various fixes returned by the quality analizer
Encapsulate "state" variable and renamed getState()/setState(e) to state()/state(e)
